channel.title: meetup on OJ's Perspective
channel.description: Recent content in meetup on OJ's Perspective

item.title: BFPG June Meetup
item.description: The time has come for another meeting of the Functional Programming minds! This months BFPG Meetup, starting 6pm Monday 28th, is the first one at our new venue: Microsoft HQ, Waterfront Place, Brisbane. For details on the location, take a look at the BFPG about page. This month we have three speakers, and I am one of them! In my talk, “Erlang - Why should you care?”, I will be giving a fairly non-technical introduction to Erlang.
